title: Guide to EulerGPT
text:
plattform for working with Leonhard Euler’s Opera Omnia, letters and other writings
all texts are available open access
EulerGPT is a tool for text analysis and text generation

most advanced synthesis of NLP models, semantic search, and knowledge graphs and the latest advances in AI and ML
uses reinforcement learning to continuously improve the models

Ambitious goal

to create a next generation digital edition of Euler’s Opera Omnia
semantic search for content and not just strings
translation to many languages on the fly
explanations of Euler’s reasoning
biographical context
reference to curated secondary literature


Quarto enables you to weave together content and executable code into a finished document. To learn more about Quarto see https://quarto.org.
